Bootstrap is a popular CSS framework that provides a set of pre-styled components, including dropdown menus. In this documentation, we will explore how to create dropdown menus and customize their options using Bootstrap 5.3. ### Objective and Scope The objective of this documentation is to provide step-by-step instructions on creating dropdown menus and customizing their options using Bootstrap 5.3.
